summary: Email from attorney Sigrid McCawley to Sarah Coulthard regarding a client's interest in attending an Epstein victims' meeting in New York on October 23, 2019. The email requests travel information for the client who will be traveling from an unspecified location.

persons.name: Sigrid McCawley
persons.context: Attorney at Boies Schiller Flexner LLP who is representing a client interested in attending an Epstein victims' meeting in New York.

persons.name: Sarah Coulthard
persons.context: Recipient of the email at sarahcoulthard13@gmail.com, being asked to provide travel information for the meeting.

connections.description: McCawley is contacting Coulthard to request travel information for her client regarding a victims' meeting.
McCawley is representing a client who is an Epstein victim interested in attending a victims' meeting.

events.title: Epstein Victims' Meeting in New York
events.description: A meeting for Epstein victims is scheduled to take place in New York.

locations: 401 E. Las Olas Blvd. Suite 1200 Fort Lauderdale, FL, 33301
keyFacts: Attorney Sigrid McCawley of Boies Schiller Flexner LLP is representing an Epstein victim client.
A victims' meeting was scheduled for October 23, 2019, in New York.
The email shows coordination between legal representatives and contacts (like Sarah Coulthard) to facilitate victim participation in meetings.
The communication is marked as confidential and subject to attorney-client privilege protections.
